desc: Vintage handmade swing shoes. Made in Italy. SuAli Swing Shoes is born from the passion for swing and vintage shoes. Handmade shoes with leather made in Italy in all the external and internal components. All shoes have leather soles to dance on all types of floors and as many times as you want.

layout.text: A tribute to Norma Miller the queen of the swing. Born in 1919, Norma Miller is a dancer, actress, singer and musician as well as one of the most famous women in the swing
